content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Global settings Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection allows the administrator to configure settings that apply to all users and policies. Global settings cannot be customized for specific users or policies.
